description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: A new radar centre in Bremerhaven provides greater navigational safety in the Weser estuary, one of the busiest German shipping routes; Colonel Glenn's tour of Berlin; a daring escape by a youth from the Soviet sector; automatic traffic control apparatus records traffic offences; Frankfurt, scene of the 62nd International Motor Show, and an annual Book Fair; an international fencing contest and growing enthusiasm for the gyro wheel, a new piece of gymnastic apparatus.
